items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Tender grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.

items.name: Chocolate Brownie
items.description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

items.name: Lemon Cheesecake
items.description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.
